headline.main: REPATRIATED FRENCH COMPLAIN IN LETTERS; Notes to Beirut Indicate Their Discontent Upon Return

lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Lebanon, Oct. 4 -- A number of uncensored letters from French citizens who elected recently to leave Syria and Lebanon for the homeland that have been received by friends and relatives here indicate disillusionment and include frank confessions that "an unhappy choice in view of the tragically changed conditions" in the metropolitan area had been made.
abstract: citizens who left Syria and Lebanon for France write back of discontent with French conditions
